message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This unique item is worth $1200000 to you, and I am offering it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1150000. This offer allows you to secure the item at a premium price while still saving compared to its true value. I believe this is a fair deal that benefits both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
